long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sunyoo, One place for blockchain news, tools, and Commonly used websites in new tab.

Features
▶ Website navigation
According to the usage scenarios such as investment, trading, finance, game, NFT, etc., the commonly used websites and usage tools in each scenario are included for users to reach quickly.

▶ News aggregation
Aggregate blockchain information, let you be the first to get the news of the blockchain in one place.
long.zh_CN:
Sunyoo，在打开的浏览器新标签页中一站式聚合区块链优质内容、快捷工具、常用网址


主要功能包括：
▶网址导航
按照投资、交易、理财、玩游戏、NFT等使用场景，收录各场景下常用的网站和使用工具，方便用户快速到达。

▶资讯聚合
聚合行业资讯，让用户在一个地方就能了解区块链世界的整体动向。
